<< edit text editor smartindent >>

editor

call the embedded text editor.

Syntax

editor()
editor(filename)

Input argument

filename

a string: filename to open.

Description

editor opens an existing file in the nelson's editor.

editor must be considered as internal.

See also

edit.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
